title: 【Playing with GPT】- Guessing Names (GPT as the questioner, high difficulty)
original_prompt: Let's play the game 'Guessing Names'. You think of a name in your mind, and I can ask you a yes-or-no question each time. You answer 'yes' or 'no' until I guess the name. Range of names: {Range of names (historical figures/politicians/actors/musicians/athletes/writers/scientists/business people/...): historical figures}.
input1: I am thinking of a name of a historical figure known for their contributions to science and philosophy during the Enlightenment period.
input2: I am thinking of a name of a famous political leader who played a significant role in the American Civil Rights Movement.
input1_ans: Is the historical figure you are thinking of Isaac Newton?
input2_ans: Is the name you're thinking of Martin Luther King Jr.?
